# Class CustomNode

Base class for creating custom graph processing nodes. Provides a framework for implementing custom data transformation logic.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Properties

id input output

### Methods

build process

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new CustomNode(id: string): [CustomNode]()

Creates a new CustomNode instance.

#### Parameters

    * id: string

Unique identifier for the node

#### Returns [CustomNode]()




## Properties

### `Readonly`id

id: string

Unique identifier for the node

### `Protected`input

input: [CustomInputDataType](/enums/common_types.CustomInputDataType) | [CustomInputDataType](/enums/common_types.CustomInputDataType)[]

Input type for the node

### `Protected`output

output: [CustomOutputDataType](/enums/common_types.CustomOutputDataType)

Output type for the node

## Methods

### build

  * build(): [CustomNodeWrapper](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_node_wrapper.CustomNodeWrapper)

Builds a CustomNodeWrapper for this node.

#### Returns [CustomNodeWrapper](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_node_wrapper.CustomNodeWrapper)

New CustomNodeWrapper instance that wraps this node




### process

  * process(_inputs: any[]): any

Processes the input data. This method must be implemented by subclasses.

#### Parameters

    * _inputs: any[]

Array of input data that implements the CustomInputDataType enum

#### Returns any

#### Throws

InworldError if not implemented by subclass

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
